cause.description:
The Jewish Council for Public Affairs (JCPA) is the national umbrealla organization for Jewish organizations engaged in public policy work. Our members include 14 national organizaitons and 125 local community relations councils. We are charged with building concensus on public policy and community relations issues in the Jewish community and coordinating our community's advocacy and activism.
Our National Members include: American Jewish Committee American Jewish Congress Anti-Defamation League B’nai B'rith Hadassah Jewish Labor Committee Jewish Reconstructionist Federation Jewish War Veterans National Council of Jewish Women Union for Reform Judaism Union of Orthodox Jewish Congregations of America United Synagogue of Conservative Judaism Women's American ORT Women's League for Conservative Judaism
Below is just a small taste of what we do. Over the past 50 years, JCPA has developed deep policy expertise and a wide range of positions. The positions listed is just a small piece of our work. They also are listed in no particular order. If you are interested in our full list of policy positions check out our website, www.jewishpublicaffairs.org
Also check out our facebook groups.
